original.question: Were Enrique Carreras and Lionel Ngakane both filmakers during the 20th century?
original.context: Lionel Ngakane (17 July 1928 – 26 November 2003) was a South African filmmaker and actor. Enrique Carreras (January 6, 1925 - 29 August 1995) was a Peruvian-born Argentine film director, screenwriter and film producer, and was one of the most prolific film directors in the history of the Cinema of Argentina.

context_templates: Lionel Ngakane (#PROPERTY) was a South African filmmaker and actor.
Enrique Carreras (#PROPERTY) was a Peruvian-born Argentine film director, screenwriter and film producer, and was one of the most prolific film directors in the history of the Cinema of Argentina.
